E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Jason Grilli
Dear Sir,
Jason Grilli has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 3.54 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Carlos Castillo
Dear Sir,
Carlos Castillo is doing pretty good at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 3.48, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Status of Timo Perez
Dear Sir,
Timo Perez isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .209, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
